snippet.title: Alaskan Road Truckers: 8 Minutes of Developer-Narrated Gameplay
snippet.description:
Alaskan Road Truckers (formerly known as Alaskan Truck Simulator) is exactly what it sounds like it is: a simulation of life as a semi-truck driver battling the elements of Alaska in one of the toughest jobs on four wheels. In this exclusive eight-minute gameplay video, one of the developers talks you through the features and core philosophies of the game.

#AlaskanRoadTruckers #Gameplay
